revised_title: Transmission Properties of Anisotropic Rectangular Plates
tldr: The article investigates the transmission of sound through anisotropic rectangular plates in the limit of high frequencies. It derives asymptotic formulae for the transmission properties of such plates and presents explicit results for a plate with different bending stiffnesses in the x- and y-directions. The study focuses on the average power flow through the plate, normalized with respect to the average incident power, and provides different forms of the radiation efficiency depending on the coincidence frequencies.
scientific_discipline: Engineering and Technology > Acoustics and Sound
